resources.string: "Bu özellik şifrelidir ve Avast'ın sunucularına (%s) cihazınızın kimliği bu şekilde gönderilir."
Bu virüs reklam içeriklidir. Otomatik olarak oluşturanın reklamlarını gösterir.
The virus is a cryptor. It is a malicious software that transmitted by means of replicating itself in storage space.
The virus is a dropper. It carries the code that install other malicious virus.
The virus is an exploit. It takes advantage of a bug or vulnerability in system in order to cause unintended or unanticipated behavior.
The infection is inferred by using a specific heuristic. A specific heuristic analysis says that it is a virus.
The virus is a joke. It creates some annoying or humorous effect as a joke. It normally has less damage on the system.
The virus is a potentially unwanted program (PUP). It is a program that may be unwanted (like spyware, adware, etc), despite the possibility that users give consen to download it.

The virus is a rootkit. It is a type of software designed to hide the fact that an operating system has been compromised. It is used to gain control over the device by hiding deep inside the system. Rootkits allow viruses and malware to “hide in plain sight” by disguising as necessary files that normal antivirus software will overlook.
"The virus is a spyware. It a software that covertly gathers user information through the user' Internet connection without his or her knowledge."
A common suspicious type. The antivirus system is trying to classify it.
The virus is a potentially evil tool infecting by means similar to PUP.

Bu virus trojandır. It is a a malware designed to provide unauthorized, remote access to a user’s device. Trojans normally do not have the ability to replicate themselves like viruses; however, they can lead to other malware being installed on a machine, various data being stolen, or other malicious activities.

Bu virüs solucandır. It is a standalone malware that replicates itself in order to spread to other devices. Takes advantage of file or information transport features of system (such like network), it can travel without any human action. Worms almost always cause at least some harm to the network.
"Bu özellik cihaz kimliğini şifleyerek AVL sunucularına gönderir (%s)."
Çevrimiçi virüs tanımlarını kullanarak uygulama adlarını ve ayrıntıları tarayın.
"Bu özellik cihaz kimliğini şifreleyerek Tencent sunucularına gönderir (%s)."
